AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.banid
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Bans the specified Gamertag/PSN ID from the current server indefinitely.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.banlist
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Prints a list of all banned players to the console.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.banlistex
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Prints a list of all banned players to the console, with ban notes.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.bans
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Prints a list of all banned players to the console.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.broadcastadmincommands
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Toggles the display of debug commands (like noclip/god/giveto) to the in-game chat.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.dayview
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Toggles eternal daylight for the player who entered it, regardless of server time.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.getauthlevel
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Prints the current Auth Level for the specified player. Can also print Auth Levels for all players on the server.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.god
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Toggles god mode for the player who entered it.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.injure
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Forces the target player into a downed state.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.kickall
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Kicks all players from the server.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.killallplayer
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Kills all players in the server.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.moderatorid
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Grants the target player Moderator (Tier 2) Auth Level.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.nogreen
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Toggles the ability for Mods+ to hide their Auth Level status on the server.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.removemoderator
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Revokes Moderator (Tier 2) Auth Level from the target player.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.removevip
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Revokes VIP (Tier 1) Auth Level from the target player.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.say
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Displays the given message into the server chat.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.setvanishother
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Toggles Vanish for a target player on the server.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.skipqueue
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Allows the target player to skip the queue when the server is full.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.sleep
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Forces the player who entered the command to go to sleep.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.teleport
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Teleports the chosen player to a chosen location.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.teleport2me
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Teleports the chosen player to you.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.teleportgrid
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Teleports everyone in the server to a specified position, with spacing at a chosen rotation, with a maximum player count per row.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.teleportpos
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Teleports a chosen player to a specified position and chooses whether to place them on the ground.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.unban
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Un-bans the specified player from the current server.

AssortedGlobalSettings.name: global.vipid
AssortedGlobalSettings.description: Grants the target player VIP (Tier 1) Auth Level.
